reference: Ashenfelter, Orley. 1985. Evidence on U.S. Experience with Dispute Resolution Systems. Princeton University Industrial Relations Section Working Paper No. 185.

_ and Henry S. Farber. 1985. Arbitrator Decision Making: When are Final Offers Important? Industrial and Labor Relations Review 39:76-89.
